TopicTitle: Reusable spacecraft - Journey to the Duna

Articles.Content:
Greetings to all! Sorry for my bad english. I use google translator.

Most recently, I wanted to organize an expedition to the Duna system using only reusable vehicles. Assembled using exclusively default parts. It seems to be nothing complicated in this, as it turned out.

Mission Objectives:
1. Only reusable devices are used.
2. Raising the flag and installing scientific equipment on the surface of the Duna.
3. Raising the flag on the surface of Ike.
4. The return of booster stage to the orbit of Kerbin.
5. The return of the manned ship with the crew to the surface of Kerbin.

The mission was a success.

There was hardly enough fuel! But I did not save fuel. I used MechJeb for docking. Because I am enraged by the dock! : D

Perhaps someone will be interested in this experience. Thanks for your attention!
